description: {"blocks":[{"key":"adtim","text":"A modified extraction protocol is required to extract high quantity and quality DNA from fungal spores. We optimised DNA extraction protocols to obtain a sufficient amount of high molecular weight DNA from fungal spores for long read sequencing i.e., PacBio HiFi. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b43be","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kn21","text":"Note: If required, the DNA extraction protocol can be scaled up to achieved the desired amount of genomic DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: DNA extraction, PacBio HiFi, Long read sequencing, High molecular weight DNA extraction, Fungi
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"93plf","text":"Samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnn1i","text":"Fungal spores","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5907","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"754uc","text":"Consumable","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ce6h","text":"Tris-hydrochloride (Tris-HCL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"471vp","text":"Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3qnv","text":"Sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m6at","text":"Beta- mercaptoethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d6ip","text":"1.0 mm zirconia (ceramic) beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6abj","text":"1.5 and 2ml microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a98e","text":"Protease K","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdnan","text":"RNase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bndvb","text":"Sodium acetate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4k1e","text":"Isopropanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a05gc","text":"Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ooli","text":"Auto pipette and pipette tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjtok","text":"Paper towel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f03rq","text":"TE buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cag3d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8spc9","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee0g4","text":"Tissue homogeniser","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86hk7","text":"Incubator (set for 56-57 and 37˚C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"facc6","text":"Vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r95","text":"Centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"894r7","text":"Heat block (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdvqp","text":"Note: to obtain the best outcome, freshly made lysis buffer should be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3at76","text":"Make cell lysis buffer: 50mM Tris-HCL pH8.5, 50mM EDTA, 5% SDS, and 1% beta- mercaptoethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55u6b","text":"Add 250 µl of 1.0 mm zirconia (ceramic) beads and 600 µl of cell lysis buffer in a 2ml microcentrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a0oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aflnc","text":"Note: 1.0mm zirconia (ceramic) disruptor beads suit for fungal spores size from 2-3.5 μm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"37e2r","text":"Add spore sample (~50-200 mg) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bvped","text":"Homogenise with tissue homogeniser (5,000 rpm for 15 seconds) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eanev","text":"To precipitate cell debris, centrifuge at high speed for 10-15 minutes or longer if required","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4p7vf","text":"Add 20 µl of protease K (20 mg/ml, invitrogenTM, cat. #25530049) and vortex briefly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6itrn","text":"Collect supernatants to a new 1.5ml microcentrifuge tube (avoiding cell debris pallet) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bv577","text":"Incubate at 56-57℃ for a maximum of 3 hours or until the mixture turns clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lla6","text":"Add 3 µl of RNase (100 mg/ml, Qiagen cat. # 19101) and incubate at 37˚C for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afj2p","text":"Note: If different concentrations of protease K and RNase were used, the manufacturer’s recommended volume will need to be adjusted accordingly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5mgo","text":"Cool it at room temperature ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eotbp","text":"To precipitate protein, add half of volume of 3M sodium acetate (pH5.2) to the supernatant ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cfnm","text":"Vortex for 30 seconds (make sure to vortex well, it should get cloudy)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8roc","text":"Centrifuge for 5-10 minutes at high speed or until the supernatant have no visible cell debris or protein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f059l","text":"Transfer supernatant to new tube (avoiding precipitated protein pallet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq6r2","text":"To precipitate DNA, add equal amounts of isopropanol and invert the tube 10x *DO NOT VORTEX*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7pb8","text":"Add 20-50µl of TE buffer (InvitrogenTM, cat. #12090015) and leave the DNA pallet to dissolve at room temperature overnight or at 56ºC for no longer than 10 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duu5b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sov7","text":"To ensure there is no alcohol residue, dry tubes at room temperature for an hour or in heat block (56ºC) for no longer than 15 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cij70","text":"Remove supernatant and dry tube over paper (again, please use pipette to avoid disturbing DNA pallet) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ekfrf","text":"Centrifuge for 10-15 minutes at high speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10h28","text":"To wash DNA pallet, add 1000 µl of freshly made 70% (80% v/v) ethanol and invert the tube 10x *DO NOT VORTEX*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":94,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1j9t0","text":"Remove supernatant and dry tube over paper (please use pipette to avoid disturbing DNA pallet) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0d5e","text":"Centrifuge for 10-15 minutes at high speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6em6","text":"Example of four Metarhizium spp. genomes. The total amount of DNA extracted per sample ranged between 23-43µg (derived from approximately 500 - 1,000 mg of starting fungal material. 5 times scaled up) and was submitted to Genomics WA (Perth, Australia) for whole genome sequencing. The genomes were sequenced using PacBio HiFi Sequel‱ ll sequencer with SMRTBell technology. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":333,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drcq9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ca4u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4s1tu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aglq5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9s11","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"214D0FC7F61011EEACA30A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"align":"left","guid":"4B827BA47E3E4266B2134D16D4E902FE","height":"359","is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":null,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/Yj2AMG569gTkb6xvRvbJfFeSU-3dBpw5UDre7PBMAGMO0G7z8wqxjJNOWtA2PFatdRBkMFpX4WIOcTKcS5X_EaO9ELBAYL1-JyA1GMne0YG5ryInKhz35RzOEAjsV_8VCEDMf67XQLWErD6LBP8huQ","shadow":false,"source":"https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/Yj2AMG569gTkb6xvRvbJfFeSU-3dBpw5UDre7PBMAGMO0G7z8wqxjJNOWtA2PFatdRBkMFpX4WIOcTKcS5X_EaO9ELBAYL1-JyA1GMne0YG5ryInKhz35RzOEAjsV_8VCEDMf67XQLWErD6LBP8huQ","width":"504"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"align":"left","guid":"925E0D7E1C7B46F5AD8AF6878C00A803","height":"382.84348142147064","is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":null,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/o-cRFkKOuVTvVMiG-zzlmqMmqu3QtwICe6QvDR0Z7EeRPlMQ9hWl519BGqeuMt0fYN-wWqoGQQNgvMc9X2ZTgBj5ebjg5MeH-iMFz5xXYL5eSYrNj3KOWWZk5O8ll2OcEbpbR5MWvU1jv1Q89ayUlg","shadow":false,"source":"https://lh7-us.googleusercontent.com/o-cRFkKOuVTvVMiG-zzlmqMmqu3QtwICe6QvDR0Z7EeRPlMQ9hWl519BGqeuMt0fYN-wWqoGQQNgvMc9X2ZTgBj5ebjg5MeH-iMFz5xXYL5eSYrNj3KOWWZk5O8ll2OcEbpbR5MWvU1jv1Q89ayUlg","width":"489"}}}}
